meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Ad Hoc Committee on Legislative Affairs
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6ES City Hall and via videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the January 6, 2025, Ad Hoc Committee on Legislative Affairs Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Movement of election dates and ranked choice voting
agenda_items.description: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Amend local government election dates and authorize ranked choice voting for local government elections' from Pursue to Support within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Enhance safety for residents of senior facilities
agenda_items.description: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Enhance safety for residents of senior facilities' from Monitor to Support within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Support transparency in utility operations
agenda_items.description: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Support transparency in utility operations and grid reliability' from Support to Monitor within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Support rail safety legislation
agenda_items.description: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Support rail safety legislation to ensure transparency and protection of local communities' from Support to Monitor within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Promote mental and physical healthcare
agenda_items.description: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Promote proper mental and physical healthcare for all, including participation in Medicaid' from Support to Monitor within the state legislative program appendix.

agenda_items.title: Seek clarity regarding card rooms
agenda_items.description: Consider recommending the movement of the item 'Seek clarity regarding card rooms' from Monitor to Pursue within the state legislative program appendix.
